Name: Tailwhip
Description: Deal 1 damage to exactly two enemies.

Name: Strike
Description: If you have played another action with one of your partner's icons today, deal 2 damage to one enemy.

Name: Lash Out
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If another enemy has been discarded from the field this turn, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Inspire Fear
Description: Deal 2 damage to one or two non-elite enemies.

Name: Take Down
Description: Deal 5 damage to one elite enemy.

Name: Bite
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If you have played another action with one of your partner's icons today, you may also deal 2 damage to another enemy.

Name: Encircle
Description: Deal 6 damage divided as you choose between one or two enemies.
